original_text: He also built towers in the wilderness and dug many cisterns, because he had much livestock in the foothills and in the plain. He had people working his fields and vineyards in the hills and in the fertile lands, for he loved the soil.
korean_text: 또 광야에 망대를 세우고 물 웅덩이를 많이 파고 고원과 평지에 가축을 많이 길렀으며 또 여러 산과 좋은 밭에 농부와 포도원을 다스리는 자들을 두었으니 농사를 좋아함이었더라

sentences.original_text: He also built towers in the wilderness

sentences.korean_translation: 그는 많은 가축을 가지고 있었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: in the foothills and in the plain
He had people working his fields
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 밭에서 일할 사람들을 두었습니다
